description: r1: Ship hull (001_SHIP_RAOS) benchmark. AQWA (500m depth, 10 freq, 9 headings) vs OrcaWave matched model (500m depth, 20 freq, 9 headings). Mass properties matched. r4 report format.
changes: AQWA native mesh (8,615 panels) vs OrcaWave AQWA dat import
OrcaWave includes roll viscous damping (36,010 kN-m-s/rad)
